ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ سَعِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah has cursed the kafirun and prepared a Searing Blaze for them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily God has cursed the infidels, and prepared a blazing fire for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah has cursed the unbelievers and has prepared for them a Blazing Fire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God has condemned the unbelievers and prepared for them a burning torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah has indeed cursed the disbelievers, and has kept prepared for them a blazing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, Allah has cursed the disbelievers, and has prepared for them a flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely Allah has cursed the unbelievers and has prepared for them a burning fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God has cursed the unbelievers, and prepared for them a Blaze,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Allah hath cursed the disbelievers, and hath prepared for them a flaming fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God has rejected those who deny the truth and prepared for them a blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Allah hath cursed the infidels, and hath gotten ready for them a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Allah has cursed the faithless and prepared for them a blaze,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily Allah has cursed the Unbelievers and prepared for them a Blazing Fire,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, Allah has cursed the disbelievers, and has prepared for them a flaming Fire (Hell).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah has cursed the unbelievers and prepared for them a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God has cursed the disbelievers, and has prepared for them a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, Allah has cursed the disbelievers and prepared for them a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:64] God has indeed cursed the disbelievers, He has banished them [from His mercy], and prepared for them a blaze, a violent fire into which they shall be admitted,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Allah hath cursed) chastises (the disbelievers) the disbelievers of Mecca on the Day of Badr, (and hath prepared for them a flaming fire,
